title: Ajay R
text: Sameer provided really bad support on 29 Aug, 2:28 PM. I raised a valid issue where the app showed less redemption amount. Despite clear screenshots and explanation, support gave vague and unhelpful replies. No clear answers, just confusion. Very disappointing experience. We trust Groww with our money and deserve transparent support.
author: Ajay R

text: 2nd review : Groww is best investment app that I ever used. New update is just awesome. I can see my all past performance of my stocks portfolio in just seconds. 1st review. Dear groww. I am investing with you from past 2 years. I have an issue , that in your app the my watchlist are only 5, means you can create only 5 watchlists. Can you please increase this number. Bcos I want to add many more lists for keep tracking my different favorite stocks. Thanks for your valueable time.

title: Sushir
text: I‚Äôve been using Groww for the past 3 years and have always loved the clean UI it‚Äôs one of the best among investment platforms. However, I‚Äôve noticed a recent change on the laptop/desktop view that‚Äôs a bit disappointing. Earlier, the home screen used to show both the percentage change and the actual market point change (up or down). Now, it only displays the percentage, which feels like a downgrade. That extra information was quite helpful at a glance.
author: Sushir

title: Rupesh Kadam
text: Disappointing Experience with IPO Subscription Update. I've been using this app for a while now, but my recent experience with IPO subscriptions has been quite disappointing. The app fails to update IPO subscriptions in real-time, leaving me uncertain about current subscription status. I've had to cross-check with other brokers like Upstox, where the subscription status is reflected accurately and in real-time.
author: Rupesh Kadam

title: Mayank Tripathi
text: Serious reliability concerns for active traders Groww‚Äôs recurring technical issues during critical market hours raise serious concerns about the platform‚Äôs reliability and infrastructure. Such outages have led to significant financial losses for many users, and a mere apology does not resolve the impact of missed trading opportunities. For a platform operating in the financial space, ensuring system stability and user trust should be a top priority.
author: Mayank Tripathi
